p:
We used previously validated SSRs as highly polymorphic markers to provide continuity with our published Ae. albopictus population data and because their use allowed accurate biogeographic data analyses especially at macrogeographic scale. Indeed, the availability of a population SSR genotype dataset was a reliable resource for ABC simulations as SSRs represented a good balance between being well characterized (i.e. in terms of mutation model) and having sufficient genetic diversity to provide statistical power, as we previously assessed
31 .
